price: 14. Baarri u ah labadiisa waalid, mana aheyn macangag, caasi ah madax adag.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
